title: Any Rioter want to play w/ me for my 1000th win?
body: I am at 999 normal wins now, does any rioter want to play with me for my 1000th?

replies.body: ^You just blew my mind.  I never receive a response from any Rioter.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=zUuhdnT2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-17T17:35:14.209+0000)
>
> When are you free? :D

Oh, sweet! I'm available 24/8. I pretty much play through leap years xD

lolno

Trust me when I say, more than likely, no Rioter is going to play with you because you hit 1000 games won.  I've been playing for 4 years now, and I've been lucky to see 2 Riot employees in game.

> [{quoted}](name=Fanryu,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=zUuhdnT2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-17T16:32:56.302+0000)
>
> lolno
> 
> Trust me when I say, more than likely, no Rioter is going to play with you because you hit 1000 games won.  I've been playing for 4 years now, and I've been lucky to see 2 Riot employees in game.

We absolutely still do it! It's just a matter of if we see the post!
